page.title: 13Ladock School
page.content: We have two classrooms, an Infants and a Junior. There are 45 full time pupils and 7 part time. In the Winter we have a Film Club. We choose films to show at Film Club in the Infants classroom at night. We also have a Bird Club which meets once a month like the Film Club. We pay 50p to be a member. Sometimes we go on a bird walk it's good fun but it's a bit muddy. Football and Sports are in the playing field. In the playground we have a netball pitch and a hopscotch. At the top of the playground we have some apparatus. Further up we've a garden.Our teachers are Miss Greet,Mrs Richards and Mrs Smith.Every Christmas we do a play which we enjoy. Also we do Maths,English,Reading and Tables. The best things are trips. I have been to Padstow,Plymouth,Bath and London. Every year we have a Fete.
